DESCRIPTION: -- Query 1: Top 5 franchises by total box office gross
column6: total_streams FROM SONY_DE.PLATINUM.AGG_FRANCHISE_PERFORMANCE ORDER BY total_gross_usd DESCLIMIT 5;"

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 2: Fan engagement by region and account type
column6: avg_titles_engaged FROM SONY_DE.PLATINUM.AGG_FAN_LIFETIME_VALUE ORDER BY fan_count DESC;"

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 3: Title performance summary with revenue metrics
column7: SUM(f.stream_count) AS total_streams FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_FACT_DAILY_PERFORMANCE f JOIN SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_DIM_TITLES t ON f.title_id = t.title_idGROUP BY t.title_name

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 4: Daily performance trends by region
column6: SUM(unique_fans) AS daily_fans FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_FACT_DAILY_PERFORMANCEGROUP BY report_date

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 5: Most engaged fans (top 10 by lifetime interactions)
column8: preferred_device FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_DIM_FANS ORDER BY lifetime_interactions DESCLIMIT 10;"

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 6: Average ticket price by title and region
column5: SUM(f.theater_count) AS total_theaters FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_FACT_DAILY_PERFORMANCE f JOIN SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_DIM_TITLES t ON f.title_id = t.title_idGROUP BY t.title_name

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 7: Fan signup trends by month and account type
column6: AVG(lifetime_interactions) AS avg_interactions FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_DIM_FANSGROUP BY signup_month

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 8: Recently active fans (last 30 days) by country
column6: top_device FROM SONY_DE.PLATINUM.AGG_FAN_LIFETIME_VALUE WHERE active_last_30_days > 0 ORDER BY active_last_30_days DESC;"

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 9: Title catalog overview by genre and rating
column7: SUM(budget_usd) AS total_budget FROM SONY_DE.GOLD.DT_DIM_TITLESGROUP BY genre

DESCRIPTION: -- Query 10: Streaming vs theatrical performance by franchise
column9: 2) AS revenue_per_ticket FROM SONY_DE.PLATINUM.AGG_FRANCHISE_PERFORMANCE fp ORDER BY fp.total_gross_usd DESC;"
